episodes.title: Meet the Queens
episodes.plot: Are you ready to meet all of the new Queens competing for the crown on RuPaul's Drag Race, Season 13? Start your engines.

episodes.title: The Pork Chop
episodes.plot: 13 new queens compete for the title of "America's Next Drag Superstar".

episodes.title: Condragulations
episodes.plot: After the first contestant of the season is voted out, the queens stomp the runway in a fashion show, then perform a special version of RuPaul's song "Condragulations."

episodes.title: Phenomenon
episodes.plot: As the race for the crown continues, queens must write lyrics and perform choreography in a performance of RuPaul's song "Phenomenon."

episodes.title: RuPaulmark Channel
episodes.plot: The queens are challenged to overact in cheesy RuPaulmark holiday movies.

episodes.title: The Bag Ball
episodes.plot: Tensions rise as queens put their design skills to the test in a pageant of bag-inspired couture, and showcase three bag-themed looks.

episodes.title: Disco-Mentary
episodes.plot: The queens funk it up in a disco-dancing documentary, complete with 70s fashions.

episodes.title: Bossy Rossy Ruboot
episodes.plot: The queens flex their improv skills in a reboot of the salacious talk show "Bossy Rossy," hosted by Ross Mathews.

episodes.title: Social Media: The Unverified Rusical
episodes.plot: It's time for the Rusical. Queens must record lyrics and learn choreography as they perform in a tale on social media.

episodes.title: Corona Can't Keep a Good Queen Down
episodes.plot: In the face of a global pandemic that shutdown film and TV production around the world, the resilience of the season 13 queens made herstory as this Emmy-Award winning series was one of the very first productions to be shot in the age of COVID-19.

episodes.title: Snatch Game
episodes.plot: The queens impersonate celebrities in the legendary Snatch Game. LGBT activist TS Madison guest judges.

episodes.title: Freaky Friday Queens
episodes.plot: It's Freaky Friday. The queens are challenged to make over each other into their own drag doppelgangers.

episodes.title: Pop! Goes the Queens
episodes.plot: The queens must create and brand their own versions of extravagant soft drinks. Current reigning America's Next Drag Superstar Jaida Essence Hall makes a virtual appearance in the workroom.

episodes.title: Nice Girls Roast
episodes.plot: The queens take part in a comedy roast of former Drag Race "Miss Congeniality" winners - Heidi N Closet, Nina West and Valentina. Comedian and host Loni Love (Soul Plane) guest judges; Norvina (Instant Influencer) makes a guest appearance.

episodes.title: Henny, I Shrunk The Drag Queens!
episodes.plot: The queens flex their acting skills in a new sci-fi adventure, playing tiny shrunken drag queens. Cynthia Erivo 'Genius: Aretha' guest judges; Scarlett Johansson 'Black Widow' makes a virtual appearance in the workroom.

episodes.title: Gettin' Lucky
episodes.plot: The queens write and record lyrics as they perform to the world premiere of RuPaul's new song "Lucky". Choreographer Jamal Sims (Disney's Aladdin) makes a guest appearance.

episodes.title: RPDR Reunited
episodes.plot: The season 13 queens are back to dish on all the moments that made this season unforgettable. This gag-worthy reunion will feature up close and personal interviews, original music videos, and a special lip sync.

episodes.title: Grand Finale
episodes.plot: The final 4 must face off in a lip sync smackdown for $100,000 and the title of America's Next Drag Superstar.
